cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)secret.(53) 135ZOTH APRIL, 1953CABINETTHE sudan memorandum by the Minister of-Housing-andLocal GovernmentI have read the memorandum by the Minister ofState (C.(53) 131).2. Unless, as I hope, the measures to be mentionedorally (paragraph 14) are of special significance, I would venture to express the view that the scale of the operation proposed is far too modest.3. We have from April to the autumn for our election campaign. For these elections will, in effect, decide the futureof the Sudan, and to a large extent of British prestige in africa and the Middle East.H. M.COPY NO.Ministry of Housing and LocalGovernment, S. W. 1.20TH APRIL, 1953.
